basics.name: Zhaokun Jiang
basics.label: Graduate Student, SJTU
basics.summary: I'm currently a graduate student in translation and Interpreting (MTI). Besides that, I used to work in the financial sections and human resources departments of major corporations. But I am also passionate about machine learning and linear algebra! Also, I love workout in my spare time.

interests.name: Programming
keywords: Anything to do with Python or R!

education.major: Working on Master of Translation and Interpreting (MTI) in School of Foreign Languages.
education.summary: A member of both the university's Student Union Academic Department and the school's Promotion and Publicity Department.

education.major: Majored in English (GPA: 3.86, ranking: top 4%) and minored in Financial Management (GPA: 3.88, ranking: top 3%).
